interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2016/03/03 Store: Pure Body Naturals Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} Review Text: I have long black hair and of medium thickness. The length is up to my belly button which is consider very long. It's hard to manage sometimes because I don't like shampoo that weighs my hair down or make them tangled.

This argan oil shampoo smells very good but I prefer something that is not scented with chemicals which are labeled as "parfum"
The scent don't really bother me. The texture is nice and not too thick. Lathers up my hair nicely with a quarter size. Since I have a lot of hair, I have to use a quarter size or more. I scratch and rub my scalp for about 30-50 seconds before I rinse in a bucket. This helps me to clean my hair even better. Instead of just rinse form the shower, which dandruff can still stick in my hair.
I am quite impressed with the result. My hair is not too dry not oily at all but moisturized. It feels silky with some volume and smells great. Review Title: It's hard to manage sometimes because I don't like shampoo that weighs my hair down or make them ... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

eos Smooth Lip Balm Sphere, Honeysuckle Honeydew 0.25 oz eos ['For the most up to date information, we recommend you visit the manufacturer website for the best product details, including ingredients, hazards, directions and warnings. This product offering is for 1 Retail Package'] {'Brand': 'Eos', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Color': 'Honeysuckle Honeydew', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Softening,Smoothening,Nourishing,Moisturizing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.6 x 1.6 x 1.8 inches; 1.6 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1379', 'UPC': '722532139187 892992002298 880961603553 220001195820 892992002403', 'Manufacturer': 'Everready First Aid'} This is by most one of my favorite flavors because it tastes JUST like the fruit. Very sweet but not fruity. It reminds me of when I used to eat the fruit in the summer time. So refreshing and sweet. It's a touch of summer! I have to try not to lick it away when I apply it on my lips. This is by most one of my favorite flavors because it tastes JUST like the fruit SALE! Lighted Makeup Mirror for Travel and Home 10x 1x Vanity Mirror with BONUS Eyebrow Tweezers {'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 4.8 x 2.2 inches; 12 Ounces'} This is an unique mirror. I have yet to see one like this. The mirror came with a standard tweezer. Not the best but can't complain.

It is very well made and high quality. There are two mirrors; enlargement and normal. Very well designed for applying makeup because of light.
A good size. Neither too big or small. Travel friendly and great for those messy desks ;)
Adjustable and very light weigh.

The mirror has 3 slots for batteries. To open the cover on the bottom you have to turn the circular plate.
Three slides for lighting option; top mirror light, and bottom. It's not necessary but totally awesome.
I can't get over this mirror!

Discount received for the mirror for testing and reviewing purpose. All of my reviews are 100% honest and unbiased. Thank you for reading! Woh. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Enjoys hydrating and nourishing lip care products and beauty accessories/tools, with a recent interest in hair care products, particularly those that enhance manageability and moisture.
- **Flavor Sensitivity:** Prefers sweet, fruity flavors, especially those resembling real fruits, and shows an affinity for subtle yet pleasant scents in other personal care items.
- **Seasonal Association:** Maintains positive emotional connections to summer and fresh produce, which influence product choices across skincare and hair care.
- **Texture Preference:** Values smooth textures and softening benefits in lip care; appreciates lightweight, non-greasy textures in hair care products.
- **Flavor Complexity:** Enjoys intricate flavor profiles that are sweet but not overwhelmingly fruity, and prefers subtle, natural scents in cosmetic products.
- **Brand Affinity:** Loyal to eos for lip care while being open to trying new brands for beauty tools and hair products.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally satisfied with product performance; open to trying new products and providing honest reviews, highlighting a structured approach to personal care.
- **Beauty Tool Engagement:** Recently purchased a makeup mirror and also explores hair care options that promote practicality in grooming routines, showcasing an evolving interest in enhancing both skincare and hair care practices.

The user's preferences underscore a focus on sensory experiences, emotional connections, and effective, easy-to-use personal care products.
